ABOUT ME

My name is Quan Dau. I graduated PhD degree in Civil Engineer from the Khon Kaen University. My research focuses on Water Science and Global Climate Change studies. I have experience working as Postdoctoral Researcher at Heriot-Watt University, United Kingdom from 2018-2020 ðŸ˜Š
